statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 50
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT first_name, age, outcome FROM patients WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, city FROM patients WHERE state = 'California'
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM patients WHERE outcome = 'recovered'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' AND city = 'New York' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM patients
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT name, age, city FROM Patients WHERE state='California'
SELECT patient_id, name, age, gender, city FROM Patients WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM Outcomes
SELECT outcome_id, diagnosis, treatment, outcome FROM Outcomes WHERE outcome='Successful'
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, city, state FROM Patients WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT Patients.name, Outcomes.diagnosis FROM Patients INNER JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id WHERE Patients.city = 'New York';
SELECT Patients.name, Patients.age, Outcomes.treatment FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id ORDER BY Patients.name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM Patients JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM admissions ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, outcome_result FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, admission_date, admission_type FROM patients JOIN admissions ON patients.patient_id = admissions.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM outcomes WHERE patient_id = 3 AND outcome_result = 'Recovered';
SELECT patient_name, outcome_result, outcome_date FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id WHERE outcome_date >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Visits WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM Medications ORDER BY prescription_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT visit_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM Visits WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY visit_date DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE prescription_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY medication_name
SELECT * FROM Outcomes WHERE outcome_type = 'Improvement' AND outcome_description LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT * FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientDemographics;
SELECT patient_name, city FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, condition, diagnosis_date FROM MedicalHistory ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_description, start_date, end_date FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientDemographics WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT outcome_description, outcome_date FROM PatientOutcomes WHERE patient_id = 3
SELECT patient_name, age, city FROM PatientDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT condition, diagnosis_date FROM MedicalHistory WHERE patient_id = 5
SELECT patient_name, treatment_description, start_date FROM PatientDemographics JOIN TreatmentPlans ON PatientDemographics.patient_id = TreatmentPlans.patient_id
